Quilldart nodded. "Yes Prime wa sa good leader. Galvatron beat him in that 
battle, but lost his will to Unicron when that damn starscream betrayed him. 
I  was created by Unicron to aid him from the shell of an barley living 
spark. When he rebelled unicron's orders backfired on him and I helped him. 
Though he lost his battle with Rodimus Prime due to the matrix...his evil was 
never destroyed."

--part1_f5.20912c86.2a91b348_boundary
